articles.title: Saudi Arabia Hosts G20 Summit Today In A First For An Arab Nation - NDTV
articles.description: Saudi Arabia hosts the G20 summit Saturday in a first for an Arab nation, with the downsized virtual forum dominated by efforts to tackle the coronavirus pandemic and a crippling economic crisis.
articles.content:
A photo of G20 Leaders projected at the historic site of al-Tarif in Diriyah district.

articles.title: This state starts night curfew in 5 cities from tonight; read govt guidelines - Zee News
articles.description: Amid the rising number of COVID-19 coronavirus cases, Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan announced a night curfew in five districts.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Reinfection within 6 months unlikely, study says - Boston 25 News
articles.description: People infected with the coronavirus are not likely to be reinfected with it for at least six months, according to a study by the University of Oxford.
articles.content:
This is really good news, because we can be confident that, at least in the short term, most people who get COVID-19 wont get it again, David Eyre, who co-led the study, told Reuters.
